QuestData.Title: Step Into My Barrow
QuestData.Description: I've still got no clue where all these bugs came from. My best guess is the cataclysm stirred up some underground nests we never knew about.$B$BNo use getting distracted with that when they need killing, though!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 10 Coldlurk Creepers and 5 Coldlurk Burrowers.
QuestData.CompletionText: I figured a talented $c like you would have no problem taking care of a few bugs.$b$bI GUESS I FIGURED WRONG.
QuestData.RewardText: Hey, nice work!$b$bIf you ever want to come back and kill some more bugs for absolutely no additional reward, please, feel free!
